Key Match Events: Corbin Carroll hit a go-ahead grand slam with the bases loaded in the 8th inning
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Carlos Mendoza expressed confidence in closer Edwin Díaz's ability to rebound
Post-Match Reflections: Edwin Díaz expressed confidence in his ability to rebound, but acknowledged the team's uphill battle
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets' four-game deficit behind the Braves for the last NL Wild Card spot is their largest since June 8
The Mets' bullpen has lost Brooks Raley and Drew Smith to season-ending elbow surgeries
Others: The Mets need to find answers from their bullpen to go on a late run up the standings
